purpose: The email is a call for participation in the 41st IEEE International Conference on Software Maintenance and Evolution (ICSME 2025), which will take place in Auckland, New Zealand from September 7 to September 12, 2025. It invites researchers and practitioners to join for a global exchange of ideas and highlights the program features, including cutting-edge research, keynotes, panels, and networking opportunities. The email also encourages student volunteers to apply and mentions travel support for US-based attendees. Additionally, it emphasizes the conference's commitment to sustainability and inclusivity.

evidence_sentences: ICSME 2025 will be held in Auckland, New Zealand, from Sunday, September 7 to Friday, September 12, 2025.
This is the first call for participation ‚Äî join us for a vibrant, global exchange of ideas in one of the most beautiful and dynamic cities in the southern hemisphere.
The ICSME 2025 program will feature: Cutting-edge research on software evolution, maintenance, and analysis.
Invited keynotes by international thought leaders.
Networking opportunities with researchers, practitioners, and students from around the globe.
Get involved, meet mentors, and experience the conference from the inside ‚û°Ô∏è Application still open!
Travel support for US-based attendees is available through generous NSF funding.
ICSME 2025 aims to be environmentally conscious and socially inclusive.
We look forward to seeing you this September in Auckland for a week of inspiration, connection, and impactful research in software evolution!
